grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 偶発【グウハツ】sudden outbreak, accidental, incidental
偶然【グウゼン】coincidence, chance, accident, fortuity, by chance, unexpectedly, accidentally, contingency (philosophy)
kun reading compounds: 偶々【たまたま】occasionally, once in a while, seldom, casually, unexpectedly, accidentally, by chance
